nssactivities.title: Gandhi Jayanthi
nssactivities.description: As a part of Gandhi Jayanthi NSS volunteers of CAS Kottarakkara cleaned the meenpidipara waterfalls and surroundings.

nssactivities.title: Mental Health Day Awareness
nssactivities.description: NSS Volunteers of CAS Kottarakkara conducted a mental health awareness program, debate competition and mental health games.

nssactivities.title: Kerala Piravi Celebration
nssactivities.description: NSS volunteers of CAS Kottarakkara took a pledge, organized a quiz program and mono lingo competition.

nssactivities.title: Constitution Day Celebration
nssactivities.description: NSS volunteers of CAS Kottarakkara has celebrated the constitution day by taking oath and conducted quiz competition.

nssactivities.title: AIDS Day Awareness Program
nssactivities.description: NSS volunteers of CAS Kottarakkara has oragnised an awareness programme. The programme was lead by resource person Mrs. Rethi.S. Volunteers also conducted a short paper presentation and screened a movie which highlights the awareness about AIDS.

nssactivities.title: Self Defence Class
nssactivities.description: Organized self defense class with Kerala Police for female students

nssactivities.title: Campus Cleaning
nssactivities.description: Cleaned the campus surroundings and made it plastic free.

nssactivities.title: Youth Day Celebration
nssactivities.description: Celebrated National Youth day. Organized Wrestling challenge, Push-up challenge and Skipping Challenge

nssactivities.title: Blood Donation Camp
nssactivities.description: Participated in Blood donation camp organized by Kerala Police and SNSM NSS unit Elambalur.

nssactivities.title: Republic Day
nssactivities.description: Participated in Republic day rally organized by Kottarakkara Taluk republic day committee and Kottarakkara Municipality.

nssactivities.title: Valentines Day
nssactivities.description: Volunteers conducted and participated in different cultural programs like fancy dress competition, treasure hunt and make up man competition.

nssactivities.title: Amirtham Pothichorr Vitharanam
nssactivities.description: Our Volunteers distributed lunch to the needy people. They distributed 30+ food packets to the people in Kottarakkara railway station and ganapathy temple.

nssactivities.title: Mother Language Day
nssactivities.description: Students conducted and participated in different programs. They organised quiz competition, word building competition and elocution competition.

nssactivities.title: World Wildlife Day and World Hearing Day
nssactivities.description: Conducted awareness class on how to protect our wildlife and also conducted awareness class to promote hearing care.
